short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Blocks Ads, and replaces them with Memes!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: AdToMeme is an ad blocker that replaces them with memes! 100% compatible with other ad-blockers. To turn off AdToMeme, click on the icon and select 'turn off'. 100% family friendly! Send in memes you'd like to see to zettatekdev@gmail.com. Now with a new meme! Also, consider donating!
